  • Source
  • Forum

Development Stack

Gancio is built with following technologies:

  • Nuxt.js
  • Vue.js
  • Express
  • Node.js
  • Sequelize
  • Element.ui

Testing on your own machine

  1. Download source 
    git clone https://framagit.org/les/gancio
  2. Install dependencies 
    yarn
  3. Hacking 
    yarn dev

Please use the issue board and the forum to discuss any modification.
